entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Mildred Lake

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 21.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 21. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 27 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Wednesday 08 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 9. POP 60%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 60 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 32 in the morning and minus 17 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Wednesday 08 March 2023
